mapper.insert:
select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review_tb (REV_NUM, ORD_DETAIL_NUM, MEM_EMAIL, CM_NUM,REV_CONTENT, REV_RATED, REV_DATE, REV_VIEWS, REV_ORIGIN,REV_UPLOAD) values(#{revNum}, #{ordDetailNum}, #{memEmail}, #{cmNum}, #{revContent}, #{revRated}, sysdate, 0, #{revOrigin}, #{revUpload})
mapper.select: select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTENT,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE order by a.REV_DATE

select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTENT,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME,c.STO_NUM STO_NUM from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE order by a.REV_DATE) board) where STO_NUM = #{stoNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM, a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM ORD_DETAIL_NUM, a.CM_NUM CM_NUM, a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL2,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTENT,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME,c.STO_NUM STO_NUM , d.RPL_NUM, d.MEM_EMAIL, RPL_CONTENT, e.STO_NAME from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE left join reply_tb d on a.REV_NUM = d.REV_NUM left join store_tb e on c.STO_NUM = e.STO_NUM where c.STO_NUM =#{stoNum} order by a.REV_DATE ) board) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select count(*) from review_tb
where MEM_EMAIL = #{memEmail}
select count(*) from member_tb a join store_tb b on a.mem_email = b.mem_email join common_tb c on b.sto_num = c.sto_num join review_tb d on c.cm_num = d.cm_num where b.sto_num =#{stoNum}
